--- select_unnest_with_offset.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  UNNEST([1,2,3]) WITH OFFSET

--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Query: &parser.Select{
    pos:      0,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    Results:  []parser.SelectItem{
      &parser.Star{
        pos: 9,
      },
    },
    From: &parser.From{
      pos:    11,
      Source: &parser.Unnest{
        pos:      18,
        end:      45,
        Implicit: false,
        Expr:     &parser.ArrayLiteral{
          pos:    25,
          end:    32,
          Type:   nil,
          Values: []parser.Expr{
            &parser.IntLiteral{
              pos:   26,
              end:   27,
              Base:  10,
              Value: "1",
            },
            &parser.IntLiteral{
              pos:   28,
              end:   29,
              Base:  10,
              Value: "2",
            },
            &parser.IntLiteral{
              pos:   30,
              end:   31,
              Base:  10,
              Value: "3",
            },
          },
        },
        Hint:       (*parser.Hint)(nil),
        As:         (*parser.AsAlias)(nil),
        WithOffset: &parser.WithOffset{
          pos: 34,
          end: 45,
          As:  (*parser.AsAlias)(nil),
        },
        Sample: (*parser.TableSample)(nil),
      },
    },
    Where:   (*parser.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*parser.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*parser.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*parser.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM UNNEST(ARRAY[1, 2, 3]) WITH OFFSET
